        Federal University of Technology and Environmental Sciences, Iyin-Ekiti (FUTESIYIN) was established on February 20, 2025 as a specialised Institution for the training of Engineers, Environmental Experts and Scientists. The University has the vision to be a reputable citadel of Learning, a global player in knowledge production and dissemination, while its mission is to contribute to the progress of humanity by transformative learning through cutting edge teaching and research.

Applications are hereby invited from suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Executive Officer

Job Location: Iyin-Ekiti, Ekiti
Unit: Registrar

Lead Graphics Designer Job at FairMoney Nigeria




        
    

        
        FairMoney Nigeria is building the leading mobile bank for emerging markets. We started with a digital microcredit application on Android, and currently roll out additional financial services (current account, savings, debit card) while expanding the product to Western Africa and South-East Asia.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Lead Graphics Designer

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full time

About The Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a Lead Graphic Designer to lead and grow FairMoney’s in-house design team.
	This role is both creative and managerial as you will set the visual direction across campaigns, guide execution standards, and manage designers to ensure all output meets the highest level of quality.
	The right candidate is not just a designer but a team leader and creative strategist: someone who understands static design, motion graphics, and video, can brief and oversee agencies, and has the attention to detail and communication skills needed to elevate both the team and the brand.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead creative direction and maintain a consistent visual identity across all channels (Meta, Google, YouTube, CRM, Organic Social, Outdoor).
	Oversee production of static, motion, and video assets—including UGC content, carousels, motion graphics, and brand films.
	Manage and mentor a team of designers, ensuring high-quality output, creative growth, and adherence to brand standards.
	Collaborate with Marketing, Brand, and Product teams to translate briefs into impactful, platform-appropriate creative concepts.
	Coordinate workflow, prioritize projects, and communicate timelines to ensure efficient delivery.
	Partner with design studios, UGC agencies, and other external vendors to deliver premium video and motion outputs.


Requirements


	6+ years of professional design experience, including 2+ years in a lead or managerial role.
	Proven ability to define and maintain creative direction across multiple channels (digital, social, video, outdoor, CRM).
	Strong portfolio showcasing static ads, illustrations, motion graphics, and video-led campaigns.
	Advanced proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere Pro) and Figma.
	Solid understanding of video production, animation, and motion design processes.
	Experience managing and mentoring design teams while maintaining high creative standards.
	Excellent communication, leadership, and cross-functional collaboration skills.
	Ability to balance performance-driven creative with strong brand storytelling.


Benefits


	Private health insurance.
	Pension plan.
	Paid time off.
	Hybrid work model.
	Access to training and development programs.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Data Entry Officer",
  "description": "Pem Security Guard Network Limited is a fully licensed and insured security company with years of experience in the industry. We take pride in our highly trained security personnel, state-of-the-art technology,and a strong commitment to deliveri ng top-tier security solutions. We We offer a range of security services that meet the needs of individuals,corporate organizati ons, religious bodies,businesses and events. Our services include manned guarding, event security, corporate drivers,CCTV installati on amongst others

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Entry Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Umuahia, Abia
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a meticulous and detail-oriented Data Entry Officer to join our team in the Security and Investigations industry.
	The Data Entry Officer will play a crucial role in supporting our operations by accurately entering, updating, and maintaining vital data within our systems.
	This position requires a high level of precision and attention to detail, as the integrity of our data is paramount for effective decision-making and operational efficiency.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for managing large volumes of information, ensuring data accuracy, and complying with all relevant data management protocols.
	Furthermore, the Data Entry Officer will work closely with various departments to provide timely data support, enabling our team to focus on the critical aspects of security and investigations.
	This role offers an excellent opportunity for those looking to develop their skills in data management within a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
	The ideal candidate will demonstrate strong organizational skills along with the ability to remain focused and efficient amidst changing priorities.
	We value dedication, precision, and a strong work ethic in our team and are excited to welcome a new member who shares these values.


Responsibilities


	Enter and update data in databases and systems with a high degree of accuracy.

  "description": "Mabest Academy is a co-educational School structured to prepare each student for the journey of life by facing the future challenges with determination and positivism to excel with the highest standard of morality.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.)&nbsp;School Nurse

Job Location:&nbsp;Akure, Ondo
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Patient assessment:&nbsp;Perform physical exams, record medical histories, and monitor vital signs to assess patients&#39; needs.
	Care planning: Develop, implement, and evaluate individualized patient care plans in collaboration with other healthcare professionals.
	Medication and treatment: Administer medications and treatments, including IVs, and monitor patients for side effects or reactions.
	Monitoring and documentation: Monitor patient progress, observe symptoms, and maintain accurate and detailed medical records.
	Patient and family education: Provide education on health conditions, treatments, and self-care techniques.
	Assisting with procedures: Assist clinicians during medical exams, diagnostic tests, and other procedures.
	Lab work: Collect blood, urine, and other bodily fluid samples for laboratory testing.
	Health promotion: Promote patient wellness through counseling and education.
	Emergency care: Respond to medical emergencies and provide first aid and basic life support.
	Advocacy: Advocate for patient rights, dignity, and autonomy.
	Supervision: Supervise other nursing staff, such as LPNs and nursing assistants.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree with 2-10 years of experience.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@mabest-academy.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

2.)&nbsp;Cultural and Creative Art Teacher

Job Location:&nbsp;Jalingo, Taraba

Duties


	Planning, developing and implementing curriculum to meet learning goals
	Ensure proper execution of lesson plans daily
	Teach students in details all the topics related to this particular subject
	Provide extensive lesson notes for the students
	Checking the student&#39;s notes regularly to ensure it&#39;s updated.
	Practice with the students in class
	Ensure the availability of learning materials and provide guidance to the students on how to use them
	Maintain proper record of students&#39; academic records
	Assign assignments to students
	Grade tests and assignments of students
	Create a positive learning environment in order to develop the interest of the students.
	Prepare the students for external and internal examinations and competitions.
	Any other duty as may be assigned by the HOD.


Skills and Qualifications


	A Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Fine Arts, Visual Arts or any other related course. A Master&#39;s Degree is an added advantage.
	A minimum of 1 year of experience in this role or a similar role
	Possess in-depth knowledge on the core subject and skills to deliver knowledge to students
	Good knowledge of and practical use of quality and seamless training/teaching methods
	The candidate for this role is expected to possess great skills
	Good communication skills, analytical skills and problem solving skills with the ability to cooperate with other staff members
	As a Teacher, you should have the ability to work with students with different interest and capabilities
	Be patient and empathetic in your dealings with students.
	Also be very passionate about your job.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;newidealmodelschools@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

3.)&nbsp;French Tutor

Job Location:&nbsp;Akure, Ondo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Lesson planning and delivery:&nbsp;Plan and prepare lessons that follow the curriculum and meet the educational needs of students. This includes adapting teaching methods to cater to different learning styles and proficiency levels.
	Student assessment: Assess, monitor, and record student progress through various evaluations, assignments, and homework. Provide constructive and timely feedback to help students improve.
	Fostering student development: Set high expectations, motivate students, and promote their overall progress and well-being.
